content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court decided to dissolve the marriage between the applicant and the defendant the applicant was awarded a land plot and a vehicle but also ordered to pay compensation to the defendant the court recognized the applicants personal obligations to a bank the case involved various articles related to personal property and obligations of spouses in relation to matrimonial property the applicant sought the dissolution of the marriage property division and payment of debts the defendant filed a defense and counterclaim the court will decide on the claims divide the property determine liabilities and the amount of maintenance to be paid the costs of the proceedings will be awarded proportionally the court has decided to dissolve the marriage awarding the applicant the land plot and vehicle but also ordering compensation to the defendant the court has dismissed certain parts of the application and counterclaim the defendant has been ordered to pay the applicants costs while the applicant has been ordered to pay the defendants costs
